description.zh: Gotify/server 是一个自托管的消息服务器，支持通过 REST API 和 WebSocket 实现实时消息收发。它旨在提供一个简单、开源的解决方案，支持用户和应用管理。项目强调易用性、可扩展性和实时通信能力。
description.en: Gotify/server is a self-hosted messaging server that enables real-time message exchange via REST API and WebSocket. It was created to provide a simple and open-source solution for sending and receiving messages with support for user and application management. The project emphasizes ease of use, extensibility, and real-time communication capabilities.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 提供轻量级的自托管消息传递解决方案
- 通过 WebSocket 支持实时双向通信
- 通过插件和多客户端接口提供灵活扩展性

## 功能列表:

- 通过 REST API 发送消息
- 通过 WebSocket 实时接收消息
- 管理用户、客户端和应用程序
- 插件支持扩展功能
- 提供基于网页的用户界面（UI）
- 提供用于发送消息的命令行工具（CLI）
- 支持 Android 移动端应用
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Provides a lightweight and self-hosted messaging solution
- Supports real-time bidirectional communication through WebSocket
- Offers flexibility with plugins and multiple client interfaces

## Features:

- Send messages via REST API
- Receive messages in real time via WebSocket
- Manage users, clients, and applications
- Plugin support for extended functionality
- Web-based user interface (UI)
- CLI tool for message sending
- Android app for mobile access
